articles.author: Shannon Vavra
articles.title: The Treacherous Mission to Evacuate American Citizens Trapped in Haiti - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Rescuers are facing an uphill battle as Haiti spirals deeper into chaos.
articles.content: Rescue groups are struggling to evacuate American citizens who remain trapped in Haiti, where a deadly eruption of gang violence earlier this month has left the state teetering on the brink of collap… [+6641 chars]
